channel.title: Why can't others log into my server?
channel.description: ok, my server is up and running and i can lo ginto it but others cant.. whats the problem? i am using my routers ip to connect [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2008, 10:10:02 PM[/size][hr]the ip is 192.168.1.100

item.title: Why can't others log into my server?
item.dc:creator: @ill4ev ill4ev
item.description:
@ill4ev wrote:

nobody will be able to get in. 192.168.1.xxx is your computer’s router IP, not the internet IP. This is NOT a unique IP. However, this is the IP you place for port forwarding under your router’s settings. This tells your router to connect to your computer for the server as apposed to another computer on the network.

I suggest getting a no-ip at no-ip.com which automatically configures to your current internet IP address.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't others log into my server?
